name: SPEEDWAY! (Recreation)
description:
THIS IS NOT AN ORIGINAL GAME! THIS IS A RECREATION OF SPEEDWAY! FOR THE MAGNAVOX ODYSSEY 2.

"A race against time - travel as far as you can before the two minutes are up. The game calls for a fast reaction-time and precise handling of the joystick control. There is a time-penalty for crashing. The game is over when time left = 0:00." Speedway!/Spinout/Cryptogram. N.V.: Philips (1978).

Travel wherever you imagine in this fast paced race against time. You better react fast to the cars you're speeding by or you'll crash and get a time-penalty. A racing game with variable speed, but you better go fast to beat the clock.
